name: Textile Art Quilt "Joy", thread painted, quilted, kite, child
description:
This little Art Quilt epitomises happiness, a child watching flight on a summers day. This textile art piece is thread painted onto a base of blue cotton covered with a layer of fine tulle. It is free motion quilted onto cotton batting. 
It measures 25 x 20 cm (8 x 10) and is ready to hang or frame.

name: Art Journal, notebook, Dream Journal, handmade, Turquoise
description:
This stunning Art journal cover has been created from a random patchwork of fabrics including velvet, cotton,painted lace, satin and much more. It has been free motion quilted onto a wool blend felt backing and lined with cotton. It has gorgeous hand dyed rayon cord accents to add a bit of zing and is bound with a shimmering purple/green fabric.
The feature piece is a section of padded hand woven fabric that is incredibly tactile and totally unique. This cover is a textural dream, combining so many differing sensations to the fingertips and to the eyes,

The cover holds an A5 Quill Notebook which contains 300 pages. The cover is removable so that the book can be replaced when full. I can change this to a 120 page Visual Art Diary if you prefer.

These can also be custom made in your choice of colours.

name: Art Journal, notebook, Dream Journal, handmade, Vintage stitched Owl
description:
I wonder what he's thinking?...Maybe you could write it down? This one of a kind journal cover is made from a background of new denim with a raw edge applique with bright vintage fabric flowers. The feature piece is a hand embroidered owl contemplating the lovely blooms. The flowers have been free motion quilted and are highlighted with bright buttons. The cover is padded with wadding and lined with a pale blue and white spotty cotton.

The cover holds an A5 Quill Notebook which contains 300 pages. The paper has been sourced from responsible sources. The cover is removeable so that the book can be replaced when full.

These can also be custom made in your choice of colours.

name: Art Journal, notebook, Dream Journal, handmade, Suns
description:
Write your favourite words or create a stunning work of art in unique style.

This one of a kind journal is made from an assortment of fabrics, including hand painted, hand dyed and hand stamped cottons. It also contains some quilters cotton and vintage fabrics. It has been beautifully hand quilted with embroidery threads to create wonderful patterns and textures on the patchwork fabrics. It has shiny cord highlights and is finished with a vintage button on the velcro closure. The quilted outer has a  lime green cotton lining, with a layer of stiffening in between to make the cover quite firm.

There are 20 pages (40 back and front) taken from a vintage sketch book. There is some very slight aging of some of the pages which adds to the charm of the journal. The pages are stitched to the outer cover down the spine of the book.

The journal measures 18 x 18 cm
